evidence.claim: One Mnet Health utilizes AWS services like Lambda and S3 for scalable backend solutions.
The company supports FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
One Mnet Health employs X12 transaction sets for eligibility requests and responses.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs to connect healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI for health data exchange, aligning with API-first platform needs.
